comments:
1. Import the attached file into a simple project (e.g. Foo)
2. Select the file, then Import... from the context menu
3. Type in a new subdirectory of the project as the destination (e.g. /Foo/bar)
4. Click Finish

observe that nothing happens in the UI, and you get the following exception in the developmoent workspace:
